notes: Seed entries are extracted from high-confidence recurring signals in listed resources.
Price ranges are operational seed ranges and should be refreshed with periodic market scans.
Glossary entries are marked needs_native_review for linguistic QA before production use.

items.title: Taxi: airport to Marrakech center
items.expected_cost_notes: Night-time or heavy luggage may move to top of range.
items.provenance_note: Derived from guide recommendations and community taxi-negotiation patterns.
inclusions_checklist: Confirm destination district (medina gate vs hotel door)

negotiation_scripts.english: How much is the ride to the center?

negotiation_scripts.darija_latin: Afak, bghit taman qbl ma n-rkb.
negotiation_scripts.english: Please, I want the price before getting in.

red_flags: Driver refuses to state fare or meter logic clearly
Price changes after arrival without prior agreement
what_to_do_instead: Use app-based taxi booking when available
Take another taxi with clear upfront pricing

items.title: Hammam: local basic
items.expected_cost_notes: Range for basic local-style hammam experiences.
items.provenance_note: Activity marketplace and guide positioning for standard hammam options.

negotiation_scripts.english: What is included in this price?

red_flags: Unclear add-on fees announced only after treatment
what_to_do_instead: Choose providers with clear inclusions in writing

context_modifiers.label: Weekend peak
context_modifiers.notes: Popular local slots and higher demand can raise quotes.

context_modifiers.label: Hotel pickup included
context_modifiers.notes: Included transport typically increases the final package price.

items.title: Souk: argan oil (small bottle)
items.expected_cost_notes: Large quality variance; authenticity claims are often inconsistent.
items.provenance_note: Souk and market guidance from editorial sources; range requires local verification loop.

negotiation_scripts.darija_latin: Momkin taman akhor ila khdit juj?
negotiation_scripts.english: Can you give a better price if I take two?

red_flags: pressure sale with no quality details
what_to_do_instead: Compare two shops and confirm exact volume before paying
